headline: Raiders' Top Hypothetical Trade Packages for Derek Carr
author: Alex Ballentine
sentences: With one year left on his contract, the Raiders have three options: Extend the quarterback and have their future at the position locked up, trade him while he still has value or ride out the season and risk losing him in free agency.

There's likely to be at least one team that talks itself into taking a signal-caller in the top 10, but it would be surprising to see any of them be a huge upgrade over Taylor Heinicke or Ryan Fitzpatrick in Year 1.

This deal would allow the Raiders to pick up a significant building block through the draft, give Jones a fresh start and give them another good pick in the 2023 draft if they have to start over at quarterback.
